recipe_name: Steamed lamb-stuffed vine leaves with spicy sauce
author: Phil Vickery
method: Place the slices of feta on top of the lamb steaks and wrap each steak in two vine leaves.  Fill one quarter of a wok with hot water, add the thyme, place a steamer on top and place the wrapped lamb in the steamer. Cover with a lid and steam for 10 minutes. To make the sauce, stir all the sauce ingredients together in a small bowl. To serve, place the wrapped steamed lamb steaks on a bed of cooked rice and drizzle with the spicy sauce.
ingredients: 80g/3oz feta, cut into 2 slices,  2 lamb leg steaks,  4 vacuum-packed vine leaves in brine,  3 sprigs fresh thyme,  2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce,  125g/4½oz Greek yoghurt,  2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley,  ½ orange, juice only,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 tbsp chopped fresh chives,  1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander ,  2 tsp clear honey,  150g/5½oz short grain rice, cooked, to serve
